text: yaqj~jO dEqvEByOq nilA#yataq viShNU# rUqpaM kRuqtvA sa pRu#thiqvIM prAvi#Saqt taM dEqvA hastA$nth saq(gm)q raByai$cCaqn tamindra# uqparyu#paqryatya#krAmaqth sO$&bravIqt kO mAq&yamuqparyu#paqryatya#kramIq-dityaqhaM duqrgE hantEtyathaq kastvamityaqhaM duqrgAdAhaqrtEtiq sO$&bravId duqrgE vai hantA#&vOcathA varAqhO#&yaM ~MvA#mamOqShaH- [  ] 21
